title: Strengthening Customer Service Practical Competencies: Pre-Service Teacher Capacity Building for Mobile Learning Design Experiments

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of foundational educational technology theories, experimental design methods, and mobile device proficiency
context.additional_context: Service/Customer Engagement Role-Specific Competency Development Program

learning_goals: Enhancing the ability to develop assessment tools considering reliability and validity in science experiment design using mobile learning environments
Cultivating the ability to apply baseline equivalence verification and statistical assumption fulfillment strategies in quasi-experimental design

Learners can set at least three stratification criteria (e.g., age, region, frequency of use) for public service user data, extract a sample of at least 30 individuals per stratum, and prepare a sampling plan and execution report.
Fostering the ability to improve education in real-time using formative assessment data in mobile-based PBL processes
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
